Tenka Fubu

Conquered cities on your home continent construct [ICON_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB] Commercial Hub and [ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] Theatre Square buildings twice as fast. Gain the Tanegashima Gunner unique unit with Gunpowder, and all Samurai units are automatically upgraded to Tanegashima Gunner when unlocked.

Japan calls, Oda Nobunaga. Through cunning, treachery and intrigue, you unified many of the warring states under your own banner. None standing against you could face your might. Now the time has come once again to take up your sword. Use your talents and skills to their utmost, and lead Japan into a bright and everlasting tomorrow.

We hope for a fair and just relationship with you, who are renowned for military bravery.
One of my generals lives nearby. I invite you to come and discuss matters further over a traditional tea.
I am honoured to go.
It is prudent that we exchange the locations of our Capitals, that we better understand each other.
Proceed.
Your delegation will be treated with respect, provided they do not make fools of themselves.
We will not accept your delegates' entry at this time.
I have dispatched some men - a delegation. They bring gifts, including a ceremonial sword.
For now, I have no objections.
That cannot be permitted.
I would be grateful if you agreed on the following proposal.
Very well. I accept our friendship, but do not betray this trust.
Sorry, but no.
You have proven yourself a worthy and mighty friend to my own. Do you accept this offer of friendship?
Well done.
That is unfortunate.
States that conflict with one another are weak. But together, we can find greater purpose. Do you agree?
I see your troops assembling at my border. If it is war you seek, then declare it now. If not, I advise you retreat.
Very well.
Maybe another time.
Your tongue is sharp, but it is worthless without a matching sword.
You are a disgrace to your people! You are no friend of my shogunate. (Denounces You.)
Pitiful fool! Now we shall destroy you!
I hereby inform you of our intention to wipe out your civilization from this world.
It was an honour to fight you.
I will not accept your cowardice.
If we do not end here, it will become a war of attrition. The time has come to cease fighting.
You were much wiser than I thought.
I had hoped you be wiser, more cunning. You disappoint me.

Oda appreciates your distant science and culture.
(You are too vulnerable.)
Oda dislikes your pathetic army so near his lands.
Yours is a nation worthy of respect and one we can all learn from. Well done.
If you wish to be a respected leader, I suggest your people begin taking up arms. A weak warlord is soon to be a dead warlord
